name: Infinite Squaredown
description:
This is a submission to Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1, enjoy :>

CONTROLS

A and D - Move

Space - Jump

E - Equip Weapon

Q - Throw Weapon

Left Mouse - Shoot

CREDITS

SFX - from sfxr and Karlson

Music - Evan King / Context Sensitive (Auto-Reverse from ICBILYAPPMIRTOAOST)

Gun Art - Kay Lousberg
